value.title: How to Show Items with No Data in Power BI (e.g. Show All Month Names)
value.excerpt: Sometimes the default behavior in Power BI can be frustrating. For example, if you are showing month names, you may see that if no data is available then those months may not be shown in your Chart or Table. Often, you would want all months (Jan-Dec) to be shown, regardless of whether data is present

value.title: Basic Sharing, and Manage Permissions in Power BI Simple, but Useful
value.excerpt: Power BI provides multiple ways of sharing content with users. Each sharing method has pros and cons and can be used for specific scenarios. Some of the sharing methods can be used together to build a framework for sharing. In this post, I will talk about the most basic way of sharing Power BI content.

If you want to do that, what are your ways and how it is possible? This might be helpful especially in the first days of learning about DAX. Let's see

value.title: FILTER Function in DAX and Power BI   Apply Custom Filter to Calculations
value.excerpt: You can apply filtering to visualization elements. However, sometimes filtering has to be done on specific calculations. This can come in handy especially when you want to compare values of other items with specific items. In this article and video, Iâ€™ll explain how to use the FILTER function in DAX

value.title: How to IMPORT data from a Power BI dataset   Premium only
value.excerpt: Get data from a Power BI dataset is creating a live connection, which is the recommended way because you will get the entire model. However, sometimes you want to import the data from the model so that you can add other things to it (like another data source). The ability to have a composite model over

value.title: Visualization Tip   Change to Filter instead of highlight   Control the Interaction in Power BI
value.excerpt: Power BI reports are highly interactive, If you select a column in a column chart other charts will be highlighted. Selecting a slicer value will filter all other visuals in the report. This interactivity can be controlled easily. Despite the fact that this feature has been released in early phases of
